title: new​
content: </> FractalitySpring.new( dampingRation: number, frequency: number, position: T, goal: T ) → FractalitySpring<T> Creates a new spring. Supports the following types: boolean, number, NumberRange, UDim, UDim2, Vector2, Vector3, Color3, CFrame

title: getDampingRatio​
content: </> FractalitySpring:getDampingRatio() → number Returns the spring's current damping ratio value.

title: getFrequency​
content: </> FractalitySpring:getFrequency() → number Returns the spring's current frequency value.

title: getPosition​
content: </> FractalitySpring:getPosition() → T Returns the spring's current position.

title: getVelocity​
content: </> FractalitySpring:getVelocity() → {number} Returns the spring's current velocity. The length of this array depends on the value type of the spring.

title: getGoal​
content: </> FractalitySpring:getGoal() → T Returns the spring's current goal.

title: setDampingRatio​
content: </> FractalitySpring:setDampingRatio(dampingRatio: number) → () Sets the spring's damping ratio.

title: setFrequency​
content: </> FractalitySpring:setFrequency(frequency: number) → () Sets the spring's frequency.

title: setPosition​
content: </> FractalitySpring:setPosition(position: T) → () Sets the spring's position.

title: setVelocity​
content: </> FractalitySpring:setVelocity(velocity: {number}) → () Sets the spring's velocity. The length of this array depends on the value type of the spring.

title: setGoal​
content: </> FractalitySpring:setGoal(goal: T) → () Sets the spring's goal.

title: canSleep​
content: </> FractalitySpring:canSleep() → boolean-- if true then the spring is not moving. Provides whether or not the spring can be considered moving or not.

title: step​
content: </> FractalitySpring:step( dt: number-- the delta-time between last step ) → T Steps the spring forward and returns the newly calculated position.
